Verifies that making cross origin requests with SameSite=Lax cookies sends us Network.RequestWillBeSentExtraInfo events with corresponding blocked cookies.

Browser initiated navigation blocked cookies:[
    [0] : {
        blockedReasons : [
        ]
        cookie : {
            domain : cookie.test
            expires : -1
            httpOnly : false
            name : name
            path : /inspector-protocol/network/resources
            priority : Medium
            sameParty : false
            sameSite : Lax
            secure : false
            session : true
            size : 9
            sourcePort : 8443
            sourceScheme : Secure
            value : value
        }
    }
]
Javascript initiated navigation blocked cookies:[
    [0] : {
        blockedReasons : [
        ]
        cookie : {
            domain : cookie.test
            expires : -1
            httpOnly : false
            name : name
            path : /inspector-protocol/network/resources
            priority : Medium
            sameParty : false
            sameSite : Lax
            secure : false
            session : true
            size : 9
            sourcePort : 8443
            sourceScheme : Secure
            value : value
        }
    }
]
Javascript initiated subresource blocked cookies:[
    [0] : {
        blockedReasons : [
            [0] : SameSiteLax
        ]
        cookie : {
            domain : cookie.test
            expires : -1
            httpOnly : false
            name : name
            path : /inspector-protocol/network/resources
            priority : Medium
            sameParty : false
            sameSite : Lax
            secure : false
            session : true
            size : 9
            sourcePort : 8443
            sourceScheme : Secure
            value : value
        }
    }
]
